bug.author: RChadwick7
bug.description: I have tried multiple Raspberry Pi Zero W's, connecting to either a phone or a laptop. From the Pi, I find the MAC of the remote device, successfully pair it, trust it, but I can never get it to actually connect.

comments.comment: If it disconnects imidieatly after connecting then it could be because of missing bt-nap. (I'm having the same problem.) See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/issues/377>#377</denchmark-link> for more info.

If you tried multiple raspis and it didnt work, there are 2 possibilities:
Your config is wrong Your phone isn't in tether mode
I wasn't aware that not having Bluetooth tethering would prevent it from connecting. It could be my phone, which doesn't have a Bluetooth Tether mode.
